data.name: The Kobolds Left Behind - Hoard of Bonus Content
data.detailed_description:
A hoard of behind-the-scenes bonus content:

Digital In-Game Art Book: Explore the development of the game with various work-in-progress renders.

Developer Videos: 2.5hrs of behind the scenes and commentary videos from the developer of the game.

5x Wallpapers: A selection of beautiful artwork from the game to use as desktop wallpapers.

~97 Expression Avatars: Character expressions from the game are included as high-res PNGs. Great for avatars, reaction images in group chats, or memes.

data.short_description: A hoard of behind-the-scenes bonus content for The Kobolds Left Behind.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700k (6th gen)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 or 16:10 aspect ratio screen ideal
